quote: All of a sudden you see reading in bed and waffles on Sunday and laughing at nothing and his mouth on yours. And it's so far beyond fine that you know you can never go back to fine.
quote_letters: ALL OF A SUDDEN YOU SEE READING IN BED AND WAFFLES ON SUNDAY AND LAUGHING AT NOTHING AND HIS MOUTH ON YOURS AND ITS SO FAR BEYOND FINE THAT YOU KNOW YOU CAN NEVER GO BACK TO FINE
